Posts.Content: It will get easier, my mum wanted to die and seriously wanted to go Switzerland, she has had every side effect you can imagine, although she suffers 2 years on, she is smiling and still with me xxx write yourself some positive notes and put them everywhere, and your bad days come look for them and remind yourself good days come to  xx Felix from Sheacare
Posts.Title: Side effects of medication

Posts.Content: I don't know how my mum carries on, to be honest, Her Surgeon asked her to stay on them till they meet in 6 month, but she has said if it comes back then nature can take it course because what is life worth if you are in so much pain, she would rather have a quality of life. You are so making the right decision for you, and you too are also very strong and should be very proud of yourself xx
Posts.Title: Side effects of medication
